video.name: Baked Chili Garlic Tofu, Veggie, Noodle Bowls | VEGAN RICHA RECIPES
video.description:
Baked Chili Garlic Tofu, Carrot, Chard and Noodle Bowls. GF
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/01/baked-chili-garlic-tofu-carrot-chard-and-noodle-bowls.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡BUY MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

The simple Marinade is the star of the dish. It is garlicky, spicy and great to bake tofu with and also to help fall in love with Tofu! Make a double batch!
Cook some rice noodles and blanch the greens with the noodles. Marinate the tofu and carrots, then bake. Use the same marinade as a dressing for the bowl. Add other roasted veggies of choice. Add some fresh basil, mint or cilantro, roasted cashews/nuts and/or sprouts for garnish. 
Easy, Spicy, Garlicky, Delicious! Gluten-free Nut-free Vegan Recipe. 

More Fantastic Bowl Meals from the blog!: https://www.veganricha.com/tag/bowl

recipeIngredient: 12 to 14 oz tofu (pressed for 15 minutes, sliced into an inch and half length slices.)
1/4 cup soy sauce (, use tamari for gluten-free)
1 to 2 tbsp sriracha or other asian chile-garlic sauce
1 cup or more veggies such as sliced carrots or broccolini
8 oz vermicelli  or maifun ricce noodles ((I use brown rice or white rice maifun))
a couple of leaves of chard, hard stems removed and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu for 10-15 minutes to remove excess moisture.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the tofu for 10-15 minutes to remove excess moisture.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the marinade ingredients in a large bowl. Slice the tofu and marinate for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the marinade ingredients in a large bowl. Slice the tofu and marinate for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a sheet with parchment. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 deg C). Fish out the tofu slices and place on the parchment lined sheet. Slice veggies like carrots, beet, broccolini and place on the sheet. Drizzle some of the marinade on  the veggies.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a sheet with parchment. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 deg C). Fish out the tofu slices and place on the parchment lined sheet. Slice veggies like carrots, beet, broccolini and place on the sheet. Drizzle some of the marinade on  the veggies.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 18 to 20 mins. or  until the tofu is crisp and veggies roasted.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 18 to 20 mins. or  until the tofu is crisp and veggies roasted.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook the vermicelli noodles according to instruction on the package (Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles and cook for 3 to 5 minutes depending on the noodles). Add chopped greens to the pot as well to blanch.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, cook the vermicelli noodles according to instruction on the package (Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles and cook for 3 to 5 minutes depending on the noodles). Add chopped greens to the pot as well to blanch.

recipeInstructions.text: Plate the cooked noodles, blanched greens in a bowl. Top with tofu and veggies. drizzle remaining marinade and serve. Garnish with cilantro or mint. Add some sprouts or roasted nuts for variation.
recipeInstructions.name: Plate the cooked noodles, blanched greens in a bowl. Top with tofu and veggies. drizzle remaining marinade and serve. Garnish with cilantro or mint. Add some sprouts or roasted nuts for variation.
